Package food

Class Order

java.lang.Object
food.Order
public class Order extends Object
Represents an order consisting of meals and dishes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Order(String orderName, Restaurant r)
    Constructs an order with the given name and associated restaurant.
